bio:
The Feral Vampire is hiding on the undercroft of Castle Volkihar.
She was exiled from Castle Volkihar by Lord Harkon. She subsequently retreated into the undercroft of the castle and eventually took control of the death hounds living there as an act of revenge.
If the player tries to converse with her, she will become offended and attack the player with her death hounds.
name: Feral Vampire
